He looked her over with a quick glance, already knowing what the bird girl is here for. H sat on a stool and watched Tails move his tools about the machinery like an artist crafting a painting. It was fairly cloudy outside, thunder crackling back and forth. Sonic hates water, so he did his best to rush back as quick as he could. The cool breeze on his fur was worth it, though.

"Heavy rain's rolling in, Wave. You should stay the night. You're more than welcome to." Tails invited her to stay over due to his friendly nature.

"I appreciate it, but I'll be fine. I've skated in bad weather plenty of times." Wave assured him, taking her now finished board and throwing it ahead of her as the garage opened.

Rain had already began to heavily shower, the thunder getting more ecstatic, whipping roars across the cloudy, now night sky. She adjusted her goggles over her eyes and jumped onto the board, kicking backward with her other foot and turning to stand on it at an angle as it boosted her forward. A crackle rippled over head and a yellow bolt of lightning struck down at the purple feathered skater. With his literal lightning speed, Sonic's heroic instincts made him leap out of the stool and sprint as fast as he could move his legs, tackling the girl off her board. The bolt missed her by just a hair, but struck the board with full might, causing it to translate the shock onto the two that now lay in the grass. "Great. Just GREAT."
Amy had managed to drag Rouge to Cream the Rabbit's slumber party, despite the bat's disdain to such pointless matters. If it were up to Rouge, she would have spent the night polishing and adding to her already massive jewel collection. Perhaps that break of habit was why things had gone so wrong.

In the middle of the "Fun and Games", as the others called them, the rabbit brat's pet chao (which she called 'Cheese', for some reason) up and left. As the little creature flew off into the darkening evening, panic overtook all of the others, who quickly decided to go after the floating bother. While the others rushed towards the forest to chase the runaway chao, Rouge paused. Something felt off. Against her better judgement, Rouge pushed her doubts aside and hurried after the group. "After all, if I don't, I'll never hear the end of it from Amy." She thought.

As the sun set over the tips of the thick pine trees that comprised most of the forest, the group of females rushed down a small path that grew thinner and fainter the farther they ran. As the golden light that was the sun disappeared over faraway mountains, Rouge's uneasiness worsened. Though the other members of their ragtag rescue crew remained focused completely on their chase, Rouge took notice that the forest which, in all other situations, was full of animal and bug life, seemed completely DEAD. This honestly frightened her for some reason, yet forward she continued. After what seemed like an eternity, the path reached it's end, resulting with the group coming to a stop. In front of them sprawled a nearly unimaginable sight.

Ringed by a suspiciously full moat lay a castle straight out of the middle ages, sized quite similarly to a large estate. Almost immediatly, Cream spotted her chao floating still in front of what seemed to be red doors. Without warning, the doors opened seemingly of their own accord, as the creature floated casually inside. Rouge's eyes opened wide at the sight. So there WAS a reason to be concerned!

Before she could object, the group rushed in. Rouge sighed in frustration before rejoining them. As the last girl entered, the door shut and locked itself, shown by a clear "Click". Almost immediately, Rouge scanned the area for any useful info. It was dark, the only illumination coming from unseen candles. Oddly, Rouge saw no sign of the chao's presence, and for a moment, all was silent. Then the light disappeared. Rouge, despite her ability of echolocation, felt just as blind as she imagined the others were at the moment. Unable to hear, see, or smell, Rouge resorted to the oldest trick in the book: Grasping around blindly until she could find a door.

Eventually, Rouge's plan succeeded, and she opened the newfound door. It was still dark, but it didn't feel like she was covered in a veil of death, at least. Rouge began to observe the room, seeing books littered about, like a child studied here. Unbeknownst to the jewel thief, a shadowy form rose from the floor behind her. 15223221.content:
Cream the Rabbit trembled in fear. Her pet chao, Cheese had suddenly taken off into the night during Cream's sleepover. As Cream, her friends, and her mother followed the rogue chao, they passed through the forest that Vanilla (Cream's mother) had always warned her away from. Eventually, they stopped their chase at a moat filled with water. Taking advantage of their pause, Cream glanced around. They were deeper in the forest than Cream remembered ever being, and across the moat, silhouetted against the moonlight, was a castle. It's walls were worn and covered in moss, yet something seemed... NEW about it.
Cheese quickly flew across a small bridge on either side of the moat and floated to a stop near the door. As the girls hurriedly crossed the bridge, Cream saw the castle's doors open on their own accord, and Cheese flew in. Without pausing, the girls rushed in after him. Immediately, the doors shut behind them. Cheese was nowhere in sight. Rouge tried the door handles.
"We've got a problem. They're LOCKED." The bat stated, a look of concern washing over her face.
"Step back, Rouge!" Amy said, approaching the door. "I'LL handle this!" Her Piko-Piko hammer materialized in her hands, and she swung it at the doors with a powerful battle cry. Her hammer hit the door... And bounced off. Amy looked at the door dumbfounded, then to her hammer. Amy narrowed her eyes.
"C'MON. OPEN. YOU. STUPID. DOOR!!!" Amy roared, repeatedly slamming her hammer into the door with little effect. Amy stepped back. Not a single scratch. Amy sunk to her knees, exhausted and hopeless.
"Now what?" Blaze moaned, dispair obvious in her voice.
"We have to stay together, thats what!" Vanilla stated, trying to stay calm in spite of their situation. "We can't go off on our own in this castle! Who knows what could happen?"
As Vanilla finished her sentence, a strong gust of wind blew through an unseen window, extinguishing the dim candlelight that illuminated the entryway. All of the girls screamed.
Cream fumbled about in the darkness, searching for some light, some indication that she'd be alright. Eventually, she stumbled into a room through an open doorway, drawn by the dim light coming from inside. The room was completely bare, except for a piece of paper attached to the wall at the far end of the room.
As Cream shuffled towards the paper, curious, a large, phantasmic form rose from the floor behind her. King Boom Boo chuckled to himself. This girl would make a perfect host! Her petite body and unbreakable innocence seemed the perfect guise to assume on his quest for revenge. No-one would guess that beneath the orange dress and cute face was a cunning and malicious mind.
Perfect! He would fly into her back, entering her body and turning her into his pretty little puppet! Delicious! Knuckles wouldn't see this coming! As the Ghost King approached the young rabbit-girl, she paused, the skirt of her small dress rustling in an unseen breeze. Boom Boo heard her give off a small chuckle before she resumed walking.
"Has she finally snapped?" The Ghost pondered. "Well, that won't matter once I'm under her skin like a worm!" He said to himself, lunging forward for the end of his hunt.
Cream spun around quickly, and to the King's surprise, was smugly wielding a vacuum-like contraption she had seemingly retrieved from nowhere. She grinned menacingly, and flipped a switch on the nozzle. "Bye-bye, King Boom-BUTT!" She laughed. The Ghost King's direction abruptly shifted, as he felt himself pulled forcefully toward the device.
"W-WHAT?! HOW?! WHAT IS THIS?!" Boom-Boo shrieked, pulled relentlessly towards the nozzle's thin entrance.
"Easy." Cream stated smugly. "I knew your ghost had possessed Cheese from the start, so I brought this nifty little thing with me for my own trap!"
"B-But...!" The King screeched, halfway in the the nozzle.
"I knew you were going to try to possess me, so I came prepared!" She gloated.
"N-Not... Fair..." Boom-Boo struggled to speak, before being completely inhaled by the void-like contraption.
Cream smiled and flicked the ghost-catcher's switch to "Storage Mode". It was time to regroup with her friends. She whistled as she skipped down the dark, empty hall.

15233222222112.content:
Tails couldn't believe it. He was right there in front of Sonic, practically touching his nose, but Sonic didn't notice him at all! He was completely invisible and inaudible to Sonic!

As Sonic continued to search the workshop for his best buddy, Tails calmed down and finally began to use his brain to figure out what was going on.

'Okay; so I'm currently invisible to others and I can't be heard either,' thought Tails. 'I'm also flying, but without using my tails to do so.'

While he was thinking, Tails was following Sonic through the workshop, on the process discovering that his current state allowed him to pass through walls.

'All indications say that I have somehow aquired all the powers of a ghost; most likely caused by the Chaos Emerald.'

Tails took another quick look at his transparent body. 'Although it is a facinating experience to be like a ghost, I'd rather get back to normal. I think I know what could have caused this, so it should be easy for me to whip up something to reverse it.'

Tails floated over to his workbench to try and build a gizmo that could change him back to normal. Unfortunately, he soon became aware that his ghost-like condition meant that he was unable to hold solid objects; meaning that he couldn't even pick up his tools!

'Oh, no!' thought Tails as his transparent hands kept passing right through his screwdriver. 'If I can't pick up my tools, I won't be able to ever return to normal! What do I do?!?'

Suddenly, Tails was reminded of the movie he had watched with Sonic the other day. That one had also been about ghosts; ghosts that made mischief by.... possessing bodies....

That was when a lightbulb turned on inside Tails' head. If he currently had the powers of a ghost, then maybe he could possess a body in order to build the device that could turn him back to normal!

And it just so happened that there was a body nearby for Tails to possess: Sonic's!

However, Tails was a little reluctant to use Sonic's body; at least at first. He was his best friend, after all.

But; the combination of needing a physical body to complete the device and the prospect of actually being a hero, soon changed his mind.

Acting on a hunch on how to possess someone, Tails dove down into Sonic, loosing conciousness when he hit him.

When Tails came to, the first thing he noticed was that he was now taller. The second thing was that his arms had sandy-colored fur on them. Looking down at himself, Tails saw blue fur covering his legs and more sandy-colored fur on his stomach.

Looking up into a mirror in front of him, Tails didn't see the yellow-furred fox he was used to. Instead, he saw Sonic staring back at him, his body perfectly mimicking Tails' movements!

'It worked,' thought Tails. 'It really worked! I'm possessing Sonic's body!!!'

A big grin formed on his, or rather Sonic's, face as Tails moved his borrowed body closer to the mirror, stopping right before Sonic's nose would have touched the glass and looked at his new reflection.

Sure; it was a bit weird for Tails to see Sonic's face instead of his own, but the fact that he could actually BECOME Sonic (in a way) made up for this.

Looking in the mirror, Tails just couldn't resist running his new hands up and down over Sonic's body. Tails was a little surprised at the fact that Sonic's seemingly thin arms and legs possessed muscles that could put an athlete to shame; but, then again, Sonic did do a lot of fighting.

As Tails continued feeling Sonic's ears, quills, tail and chest, Tails became aware of something moving between Sonic's body's legs.

It didn't take long for Tails to realize that all the examining he had done, had gotten Sonic's body aroused!

Ordinarily, Tails would still be too young to experience such a thing. However; since he currently occupied Sonic's teenage body, he also had all of his hormones, too.

Watching Sonic's 'tender parts' emerging from between his legs, Tails became so ingulfed in the new feeling of being horny that he couldn't resist it. Slowly, he moved his hands downwards to grab Sonic's 'shaft'.

But, before they reached it a voice yelled inside Tails' head as if through a megaphone. 'What the heck are you doing?!? That you want to try being Sonic is okay, but this is definitly not!!! He's your best friend; you can't just do this to him, even if you control the body!!!'

Tails' subconciousness succeded in snapping Tails out of the erotic fugue he had been under. He quickly withdrew his hands and then waited for Sonic's body to not be horny anymore. In order to speed up the process, Tails closed his eyes so that he wouldn't look at Sonic's body, though he opened them again as soon as the feeling were gone.

This incident had gotten Tails back on track. He began to walk over to his workbench to start construction on the device.

However; as he walked, another little voice inside Tails' mind spoke up. Sure; it was unethical of him to 'pleasure' himself while in Sonic's body, but that didn't mean that he had to stop being Sonic quite yet. He could still go out and try out this body's speed, maybe smashing a few of Eggman's robots along the way.

Tails' scientific mind also spoke up now. Instead of going back to normal, how about experimenting a little with these powers first? It could be interesting to see if Sonic was the only one that could be possessed, or if he could possess others, too.

What does Tails decide to do?

The reason why Rouge had not attempted to steal it before, was because of the myriad of security devices and alarms that protected it. Not even she could get through security that tight. It would take a genius to get past all of them.

However, the only genius she knew who could get past those systems was Tails, since he was the obe who'd designed them in the first place, and he was too much of a goody-two-shoes to want to let her get past them.

That was why she had jumped at the chance, when she heard a rumour about Doctor Eggman's latest prototype invention; something he called: The Phantomizer.
Appearently, the device was meant to seperate the soul from the body of whoever used it, without any negative effects. The 'Phantomized' individual would then be able to possess other beings like an actual ghost!

Naturally, Rouge had stolen it from Eggman the second she heard about it. It presented her with a singular opportunity; since Tails wouldn't let her past the alarms, she would just use the Phantomizer to turn herself into a spirit, possess Tails' body, and then get the information she wanted straight from his own mind!
The fact that she would become an 8-year-old Mobian fox boy in the process didn't worry her too much. It wasn't as if she was going to be Tails for an extended period of time; only just long enough to get the info and that would be it.

The Phantomizer was currently on Rouge's living room table with Rouge slumped on the floor in front of it. Or, rather, Rouge's body was laying on the floor. Rouge herself was currently in a spirit form, hovering over her body.

'What do you know,' she thought. 'It works better than I expected.' Her sly smile got wider. 'Now, to find that fox.'

Rouge floated out through the wall and headed towards Tails' house. She actually floated faster than she could fly, so it wasn't long before she had arrived. Judging by the sounds coming from inside, Tails was most likely tinkering with some new device in his workshop.

'Time to pay Tails a visit,' thought Rouge as she ghosted through the wall to the workshop.

The first thing she saw, was the fox in question working on some new gizmo at his workbench.

'Perfect! He's alone.' thought Rouge. She didn't waste any time; as soon as Tails put down the wrench he was holding, Rouge flew into his body. Tails' body jerked awkwardly at first, but it didn't take long for Rouge to gain complete control.

What does Rouge do now?

info.brief_description: Possess the hottest girls in the Sonic the Hedgehog series!
info.description:
Alright, if you're here, you most likely know about the Sonic characters, but in case you don't, here's a quick overview...

Sonic the Hedgehog: The protagonist of the series, this blue hedgehog can break the sound barrier and over without breaking a sweat. Cocky and arrogant sometimes, he has a good heart.

Silver the Hedgehog: This telekinetic/telepathic hedgehog from the future also has a variety of other psychic powers.

Shadow the Hedgehog: The very antithesis of Sonic, this black-and-red hedgehog is known to be moody, but is mostly cool, calm and collected. Is known to have a fetish for many different girls; Rouge is among the foremost of these.

Knuckles the Echidna: Hard headed and gullible, and another rival of Sonic (besides Shadow), his stubborn and seemingly selfish demeanor alienates most people besides his close group of friends (Sonic and the gang). He guards the Master Emerald on Angel Island as the last surviving Echidna.

Amy Rose: This pink female hedgehog is Sonic's self-professed girlfriend. Would do anything for Sonic, but other than that, is mostly a kind-hearted individual who wouldn't hurt a fly. (Unless they attempt to harm Sonic.)

Blaze the Cat: Either from the future, an alternate dimension, or both. This sassy, purple haired feline is an ally to the 3 hedgehogs, and is rumored to have an interest in Silver.

Cream the Rabbit: Sweet, calm, and peaceful, the bunny is one of the nicest people around. She's almost never seen anywhere without her pet and best friend Cheese the Chao.

Rouge the Bat: She's facing a dilemna: Knuckles? Or Shadow? Her skimpy outfit doesn't help - all sorts of men would do anything for her, further increasing her indecision. This well-endowed bat is known for using her assets in order to get her ways. And by ways, I mostly mean either getting the Master or Chaos Emeralds, or getting a guy. Either one.

Feel free to add more characters FROM THE GAMES ONLY. None from any comics or TV series. No OC's, either, please.

Enjoy, and please add! Also, please try to keep proper English. I reserve the right to edit poorly-worded chapters.
